Job Position: Facilities Manager

	Are you a results-driven professional ready to take ownership of our entire portfolio, from blueprints to ongoing maintenance?
	We&#39;re seeking an experienced Facilities Manager to oversee the construction of our new company sites&nbsp;and&nbsp;ensure the optimal functionality of our existing facilities.

	Oversee the functionality of all mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and security systems.
	Negotiate and manage maintenance contracts and relationships with all service providers.

	5-7 years in a Facilities Management or Project Management role, with a strong track record of managing both new builds and maintenance operations.
	Professional certification in Project Management, such as PMP or CAPM, is a significant advantage.
	Unwavering commitment to enforcing safety protocols and ensuring regulatory compliance.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong attention to detail.

Facilities Manager Job at Energy Shield Petrochemical Limited




        
    

        
        Energy Shield Petrochemical Limited (ESPL) is an indigenous Nigerian oil and gas company which was set up following the revolution of the oil and gas sector in Nigeria. The Company was incorporated in 2012 and commenced business immediately, with its activities spreading across the four major oil hubs in Nigeria i.e., Calabar, Lagos, Port Harcourt and Warri. As a major player in the downstream sector of the oil and gas industry in Nigeria, ESPL has a formidable reputation in the procurement, sales and distribution of petroleum products such as Automated Gas Oil (AGO), Dual Purpose Kerosene (DPK) and Premium Motor Spirit (PMS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facilities Manager
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Festac, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Are you a results-driven professional ready to take ownership of our entire portfolio, from blueprints to ongoing maintenance?
	We're seeking an experienced Facilities Manager to oversee the construction of our new company sites and ensure the optimal functionality of our existing facilities.
	If you thrive on managing complex projects, supervising contractors, and ensuring safety and compliance, we want you on our team!
	The role requires knowledge of construction, project management and long-term asset maintenance.


Key Responsibilities


	Ensure all new construction and renovation projects are completed on schedule and within budget.
	Act as the Site Authority, managing all contractors, vendors, and artisans to enforce the highest standards of quality and safety.
	Verify that all construction work meets regulatory, safety, and blueprint specifications.
	Develop and execute comprehensive preventative and corrective maintenance programs for all existing facilities.
	Oversee the functionality of all mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and security systems.
	Negotiate and manage maintenance contracts and relationships with all service providers.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Civil Engineering, or a related technical field.
	5-7 years in a Facilities Management or Project Management role, with a strong track record of managing both new builds and maintenance operations.
	Professional certification in Project Management, such as PMP or CAPM, is a significant advantage.
	Unwavering commitment to enforcing safety protocols and ensuring regulatory compliance.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong attention to detail.
